Mary Maytham Kidd a mụrụ Mary Catherine Maytham (ubochí irí abụọ na ànó n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1914 rụọ úbọchị asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel 2001 East London, Cape Province), nwa nwanyị nke Albert Archibald Maytham, bụ ónyé na-ese ihe ọkụkụ nà South Africa.
A mụrụ yá nà East London, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Roedean School na Johannesburg n'etiti afọ 1927 na 1930 ma, n'etiti afọ 1931 na 1933, ọ gụrụ na Sorbonne na Paris
Ọ zụkwara na Royal Academy School na London site n'afọ 1936 ruo 1938.
Kidd dere ma gosipụta "Wild Flowers of the Cape Peninsula" (Cape Town 1950 - okwu mmalite nke J
Smuts), akwụkwọ abụọ gbasara fungus na-égbú ègbu na nke a na-eri eri nke South Africa nke Edith L
Stephens (Longmans, Cape Town 1953) ma gosipụta usoro akwụkwọ nta gbasara okooko osisi ọhịa echedoro màkà Ngalaba Nchekwa Okike nke Cape Province
Ọrụ ya nke 1950, "Wild Flowers of the Cape Peninsula", ka e bipụtara n'oge na-adịbeghị ányá dị ka "WildFlowers of of the Table Mountain National Park", site na Botanical Society of South Africa
O mepụtakwara ihe osise màkà arịa, kaadị Krismas nà kalenda.
Ebe ndebe ihe ochie nke Mahadum Cape Town nwetara akwụkwọ eserese ya, akwụkwọ diary na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ mgbè ọ nwụsịrị
Ha na-egosi na o mèrè njem ụgbọ mmiri na 1936 n'osimiri Danube wee gaa Nyasaland na Zomba Plateau na 1943
Ka oge na-aga n'afọ 1973/74, ọ nọrọ ógè ụfọdụ na Suffolk.
Ọ lụrụ Hubert John Kidd (1896-1963), ónyé isi ụlọ akwụkwọ Diocesan College of Bishops na Rondebosch, n'ubochí irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Mee 1948
Ha kuchiri nwa, Charles James Anthony Kidd (1942-2005)
Mary nwụrụ n'ihi nkụchi obi n'ubochí asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel 2001 nà Maitland, Cape Town.
